attributes.action: Why is the Iceland revolution not on the news?
attributes.additional_details: If our media is supposed to be informative and unbiased - why is the revolution in Iceland (where the population has created a new constitution freeing the country from the worst aspects of World Banking, called for the arrest of the corrupt politicians and bankers responsible for bankrupting the country and refusing to bow to IMF pressures) receiving absolutely no airplay on any media format whilst the revolutions in Libya and other Islamic countries are heralded constantly?
